summary: When two brothers are forced to fight in the Korean War, the elder decides to take the riskiest missions if it will help shield the younger from battle.
cast: Jang Dong-Gun|Won Bin|Eun-ju Lee|Hyeong-jin Kong|Yeong-ran Lee|Kil-kang Ahn|Jin Jung|Jae-hyeong Jeon|Min-ho Jang|Yun-hie Jo|Jang-Su Bae|Won-hee Cho|Do-Hee Go|Taek-ha Hwang|Dae-Hoon Jeong|Doo-hong Jung|Bo-kyeong Kim|Kyung-Hwan Kim|Soo-Ro Kim|Choi Min-sik|Ki-su Park|Sung-Mo Um|Joe Cappelletti|D.C. Douglas|Adam Epstein
title: Lazos de guerra
